auth.Bot check failed. This may be due to net: But check feeeled. Zees mey be-a due-a tu netvurk issooes oor secooreety restreecshuns. Pleese-a relued zee pege-a. Bork!
auth.Didn’t receive the code? Check your spam: Deedn’t receeefe-a zee cude-a? Check yuoor spem fulder, vheeteleest support@angularmomentum.app, oor try luggeeng in iff yuoo elreedy hefe-a un eccuoont.
auth.I confirm that I am 16 years of age or o: I cunffurm zet I em 16 yeers ooff ege-a oor ooolder
auth.If an account with that information exis: Iff un eccuoont veet zet inffurmeshun exeests, a pessvurd reset ee-meil hes beee sent tu zee eccuoont’s ee-meil eddress.
auth.Register or log in to access all feature: Regeester oor lug in tu eccess ell feetoores
auth.The username you selected was unavailabl: Zee userneme-a yuoo selected ves unefeeeleble-a. Yuoo cun set a noo oone-a in yuoor user pruffeele-a
auth.This device has saved data from before y: Zees defice-a hes sefed deta frum beffure-a yuoo lugged in. Vuoold yuoo leeke-a tu impurt it? (exeesteeng deta vun’t be-a oofervreettee)
auth.We’ve sent a 6-digit verification code t: Ve-a’fe-a sent a 6-deegit fereefficeshun cude-a tu:

error.For security purposes, you can only requ: Fur secooreety poorpuses, yuoo cun unlee reqooest zees effter unuzeer {seconds} secunds. Bork!
error.Invalid or expired code. Please try agai: Infeleed oor expured cude-a. Pleese-a try egeeen.
error.Please verify your email address before: Pleese-a fereeffy yuoor ee-meil eddress beffure-a seegning in.
error.Your verification code has expired or is: Yuoor fereefficeshun cude-a hes expured oor is infeleed. Pleese-a reqooest a noo oone-a.

menu.If it doesn’t update momentarily, please: Iff it duesn’t updete-a mumentereely, pleese-a try tu cleer yuoor ceche-a und reffresh yuoor brooser.
menu.If you encounter problems, use the web v: Iff yuoo incuoonter prublems, yuoo cun use-a zee vebepp et
unteel un epp updete-a is reedy. Bork!

menu.minor version(s): {minors, plural, =0 {nu meenur fersiuns} one {oone-a meenur fersiun} other {# meenur fersiuns}}

Zees epp is {semver} oooot ooff dete-a. Bork!

migration.Download a backup of your data from befo: Duoonlued a beckoop ooff yuoor deta frum beffure-a zee lest updete-a. Bork!
migration.The previous data is available to downlo: Zee prefeeuoos deta is efeeeleble-a tu expurt frum yuoor prufeele-a pege-a. Bork!
migration.Your data has been updated to a new form: Yuoor deta hes beee updeted tu a noo furmet! Bork!

notification.Check out the latest updates in the Feat: Check oooot zee letest updetes in zee Feetoores secshun! Bork!
notification.Scheduled maintenance will occur tonight: Schedooled meentinunce-a veel ooccoor tuneegt et {time}. Bork!
notification.Thanks for trying Angular Momentum—your: Thunks fur tryeeng Ungooler Moomentoom—yuoor muddern Ungooler sterter keet! Bork!
notification.You successfully tested the notification: Yuoo soocccessffoollee tested zee nootifficesshun system! Bork bork bork!

page.Enter some text to have it persist betwe: Inter sume-a text tu hefe-a it perseest betveee pege-a relueeds (sefed in brooser stooerege-a)
page.If you find this project helpful and wan: Iff yuoo feend zees pruject helpffool und vunt tu see-a it gru, cunsider sooppurteeng its defeluopment. Ifery cuntreebuoshun (vhezeer thruoogh feedbeck, pooll reqooests, oor dunesshuns) helps us keep imprufing. Bork!
page.Install Angular Momentum on your device: Instell Ungooler Moomentoom oon yuoor deefice-a insted ooff useeng it feea a veb brooser:
page.Send predefined notifications to test th: Send predefeened nootifficesshuns tu test zee system
page.Sends a notification only to your curren: Sends a nootifficesshun unlee tu yuoor coorrent brooser/deefice-a. Uses zee NootifficesshunSerfeece-a durectlee. Bork!
page.Sends a notification via GraphQL to the: Sends a nootifficesshun feea GrepphQL tu zee serfer, vheech bruedcests it tu ELL cunnected cleeents feea VebSucket. Bork bork bork!
Tooree-a epps use-a neteefe-a OoS nootifficesshuns. Veb/PVA uses brooser nootifficesshuns feea Serfeece-a Vurker.
page.This project is designed to rapidly spin: Zees pruject is deseegned tu repeedlee speen up Ungooler epppliceshuns veethin a munurepoo veet meenimel cunfeegooresshun. Bork bork bork! It cumes pre-a-cunfeegoored veet useffool leebreries tu esseest veet; trunslesshun (i18n, l10n), GrepphQL und tredeetiunel REST API, vebsuckets, ooffline-a stooerege-a veet IndexedDB, serfeece-a vurkers, green test sooites (oonit und e2e) und mooch mure-a tu help yuoo fucoos oon booeelding yuoor epp insted ooff vesting teeme-a oon zee setoop.
page.Turn features on and off for feature fla: Toorn feetoores oon und ooffff fur feetoore-a fleg testeeng
page.Unable to load API documentation. Please: Uneble-a tu lued API ducoomenteshun. Pleese-a check yuoor cunnecshun und try egeeen. Bork!

privacy.This privacy notice for {companyName} de: Zees preefecee nutice-a fur {companyName} descreebes hoo und vhy ve-a meeght cullect, stoor, use-a, und/oor shere-a yuoor inffurmeshun vhee yuoo use-a oooor serfeeces.
privacy.We collect minimal personal information: Ve-a cullect meenimel persoonel inffurmeshun (ee-meil, userneme-a, pessvurd) tu prufeede-a oothenteeceeshun serfeeces. Ve-a du nut sell yuoor deta. Yuoo hefe-a zee reeght tu eccess, currect, und delete-a yuoor deta et uny teeme-a thruoogh yuoor pruffeele-a setteengs. Bork!
privacy.We use cookies for analytics (Google Ana: Ve-a use-a cuukeees fur unelyteecs (Guugle-a Unelyteecs, Hutjer) tu imprufe-a yuoor expereence-a. Yuoo cun chunge-a yuoor prefference-a et uny teeme-a. Bork!
privacy.We use cookies to improve your experienc: Ve-a use-a cuukeees tu imprufe-a yuoor expereence-a und unelyze-a seete-a usege-a.
privacy.We use the following third-party service: Ve-a use-a zee fullooeeng thurd-pertee serfeeces. Pleese-a refeeu zeeur preefecee puleecees:

profile.A verification code will be sent to your: A fereefficeshun cude-a veel be-a sent tu yuoor noo ee-meil eddress. Yuoo moost inter zee cude-a tu cumplete-a zee chunge-a.
profile.Are you sure you want to delete your acc: Ere-a yuoo soore-a yuoo vunt tu delete-a yuoor eccuoont? Zees ecshun cunnot be-a undune-a. Ell yuoor deta veel be-a permunentlee deleted.
profile.Type {text} to confirm: Type-a {text} tu cunfurm. Bork bork bork!
profile.Download all your account data in JSON f: Doonlued ell yuoor eccuoont deta in JSON furmet
profile.Permanently delete your account and all: Permunentlee delete-a yuoor eccuoont und ell essuceeeted deta. Zees ecshun cunnot be-a undune-a. Bork!
profile.Please enter a valid email address: Pleese-a inter a feleed ee-meil eddress
profile.Remove all stored preferences, notificat: Remufe-a ell stured prefferences, nuteefficeshuns, und setteengs. Yuoor eccuoont veel remeeen ecteefe-a. Bork!
profile.Verification email sent! Please check yo: Fereefficeshun ee-meil sent! Pleese-a check yuoor noo ee-meil eddress und inter zee cunffurmeshun cude-a. Bork!
profile.Without a username, your profile is priv: Veethuoot a userneme-a, yuoor pruffeele-a is preefete-a
